articles.title: WNBA expansion headed for 16 teams. Portland, Toronto and Philly are options - The Athletic
articles.description: The league hopes to reach its number by 2028, Cathy Engelbert said.
articles.content: NEW YORK The WNBA is looking to continue growing in the next few years. The league intends to reach 16 teams by 2028, commissioner Cathy Engelbert said before the draft, confirming The Athletic repor… [+3150 chars]
